import '../components/qualifications.css'; import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Qualifications() { return (

Qualifications

Essential Qualifications

Basic Requirements

  • ‚úÖ Must enjoy my terrible jokes (or at least fake-laugh).
  • ‚úÖ Willing to share fries but understands the last one is always mine.
  • ‚úÖ Accepts that "I‚Äôll be ready in 5 minutes" is a myth.
  • ‚úÖ Can tolerate my questionable music/movie tastes.

Emotional Skills

  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Willing to be in a relationship with a person who is not perfect.
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Willing to be in a relationship with a person who is not perfect.
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Willing to be in a relationship with a person who is not perfect.
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Willing to be in a relationship with a person who is not perfect.
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Expert-level cuddler (non-negotiable).
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Knows when to give advice vs. just listen.
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Won‚Äôt ghost me if I send too many memes.
  • ‚ù§Ô∏è Understands that "I‚Äôm fine" usually means "Ask me again nicely."

Bonus Skills (Not Required but Appreciated)

  • üåü Can cook a mean breakfast (bonus points for pancakes).
  • üåü Enjoys spontaneous dance parties in the living room.
  • üåü Has a pet that can tolerate my shenanigans.
  • üåü Can handle my obsession with collecting random trivia.
  • üåü Can laugh at my jokes (or at least fake-laugh).
  • üåü Can hype me up even when I look like a potato.

Deal Breakers

  • ‚ùå Doesn‚Äôt like dogs/pizza/cuddles (pick your struggle).
  • ‚ùå Thinks "Netflix and chill" means actually watching Netflix.
  • ‚ùå Unwilling to participate in dumb couple challenges for fun.

Ready to Apply?

If you think you meet these qualifications, please apply below!
Disclaimer: This is a joke. Please do not take it seriously.
But if you do, I‚Äôm not responsible for any broken hearts or awkward dates.
); } export default Qualifications;
